detaileddescription.para: 窗口在容器中的位置,由于它的值包含POS_INIT等，调整为private，不允许派生类中直接访问该变量的值

Describe 参考::SetTimer

KillTimer
char
id 定时器ID
void
Describe

briefdescription.para: 利用函数定时器来模拟一个兼容窗口定时器

detaileddescription.para:
SetTimer2
UINT_PTR
id 定时器ID
UINT
uElapse 延时(MS)
BOOL
Describe 由于SetTimer只支持0-127的定时器ID，SetTimer2提供设置其它timerid 能够使用SetTimer时尽量不用SetTimer2，在Kill时效率会比较低

briefdescription.para: 删除一个SetTimer2设置的定时器

detaileddescription.para:
KillTimer2
UINT_PTR
id SetTimer2设置的定时器ID
void
Describe 需要枚举定时器列表

Sets the next animation to play for this view. If you want the animation to play immediately, use startAnimation(android.view.animation.Animation) instead. This method provides allows fine-grained control over the start time and invalidation, but you must make sure that 1) the animation has a start time set, and 2) the view's parent (which controls animations on its children) will be invalidated when the animation is supposed to start.
Get the animation currently associated with this view.

simplesect.para: The animation that is currently playing or scheduled to play for this view.

detaileddescription.para: Start the specified animation now.
Cancels any animations for this view.
